= 605 | blank_name = FIPS code | blank_info = 46-13380 | blank1_name = GNIS feature ID | blank1_info = 1267334 | website = | footnotes = }} Colton is a city in the eastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is located in Minnehaha County, and 738 people lived there at the 2020 census. Colton became a city in 1904. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Colton website Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1904 establishments in the United States Category:1900s establishments in South Dakota
